mainEntity.name: What's the difference between service-based and platform-based pricing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Service-based pricing is a managed service where we handle the entire recruitment process for you with success-based fees. Platform-based pricing gives you direct access to our AI recruitment platform with flexible licensing based on team size and usage.

mainEntity.name: Do you offer custom pricing for enterprises?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we provide custom enterprise pricing tailored to your hiring volume, team size, and specific requirements. Contact us to discuss your needs.

mainEntity.name: Is there a free trial available?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we offer demos and trial periods for both service-based and platform-based options. Contact our team to get started.

mainEntity.name: What's included in the service-based pricing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Service-based pricing includes a dedicated account manager, guaranteed quality shortlists, success-based fees (pay only when you hire), full AI workflow management, and end-to-end support from job brief to offer acceptance.

mainEntity.name: Can I switch between pricing models?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can switch between service-based and platform-based pricing models as your needs evolve. We'll work with you to ensure a smooth transition.
